com.github.ldeitos.validation.annotation

Annotation Type ValidateParameters


  • @Inherited
@InterceptorBinding
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value={TYPE,METHOD})
public @interface ValidateParameters
    Does method parameters validation.
    Since:
    0.9.2
    Author:
    Leandro Deitos

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      Closure closure 
      Class<?>[] groups 

    • Element Detail

      • groups

        public abstract Class<?>[] groups
        Returns:
        The group or list of groups targeted for validation (defaults to Default)
        Default:
        {}

      • closure

        public abstract Closure closure
        Returns:
        Closure qualifier to recover custom ValidationClosure instance to be executed if validation process returns violations.
        If not informed, default one will be used.
        Default can be configured in configuration file or, if not, built-in component will just throw ViolationException containing violation messages.
        See Also:
        ValidationClosure
        Default:
        @com.github.ldeitos.qualifier.Closure("extededValidation.default.closure")
